function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for community cultural and sports facilities in the 5-min community life circle","Impact":"Potential overcrowding and higher risk of disease transmission due to increased demand","Mitigation":"Expand and improve facilities in the 5-min community life circle to accommodate increased demand","Technologies":"Improved ventilation systems, touchless equipment, and reservation systems","People":"Residents in the 5-min community life circle","Owner":"Local government and community organizations"},{"Description":"Decreased demand for community cultural and sports facilities in the 15-min and 10-min community life circles","Impact":"Underutilization of existing facilities, leading to potential waste of resources","Mitigation":"Reassess use of space and consider repurposing facilities or adjusting programming to accommodate changing demand","Technologies":"Data analytics for demand forecasting, flexible space design, and virtual programming options","People":"Residents in the 15-min and 10-min community life circles","Owner":"Local government and facility operators"},{"Description":"Increased use of non-contact interaction for cultural and sports activities during COVID-19","Impact":"Shift in preference for non-contact activities may persist post-COVID, impacting traditional facility programming","Mitigation":"Integrate non-contact activities into facility programming and provide hybrid options for in-person and virtual engagement","Technologies":"Digital platforms for virtual activities, interactive display screens, and contactless payment systems","People":"Community members and facility operators","Owner":"Local government and facility operators"}]}
